titleTh: เป็นทุกอย่าง
lyricsTh:
เป็นเพื่อนเธอไปดูหนัง
Pen Phuean Thoe Pai Du Nang
Go to movies with you
Cùng em đi xem phim
อยู่ด้วยกันตอนเธอเหงา

Yu Duai Kan TOn Thoe Ngao
Be with you when you're lonely
Ở bên cạnh em những khi cô đơn 

ฟังทุกเรื่องราว ที่เธอระบาย ยาวจนเช้า
Fang Thuk Rueangrao Thi Thoe Rabai Yao Chon Chao Chan Ko Yan Yindi
It's my pleasure listening to your rant till dawn
Hạnh phúc của anh là cùng em trò chuyện từ đêm đến sáng 

แม้ไม่ใช่คนพิเศษ
Mae Mai Chai Khon Phiset
Even though to you I'm not a special person 
Dù anh chẳng phải người đặc biệt

ไม่ได้สำคัญสำหรับเธอ
Mai Dai Samkhan Samrap Thoe
nor an important one for you
hay là người quan trọng đối với em


เป็นคนโทรปลุกตอนเช้า
Pen Khontho Pluk Tonchao
Drop you a wake-up call in the morning
Làm đồng hồ báo thức cho em mỗi buổi sáng

คอยเฝ้าถามและห่วงใย
Khoi Fao Tham Lae Huangyai
Ask you how your day was 
Hỏi thăm ngày của em thế nào 

อยากที่จะรู้ ว่าเธอเป็นไง ในเวลาที่เธอไม่เหลือใคร
Yak Thi Cha Ru Wa THoe Pen Ngai Nai Wela Thi Thoe Mai Luea Khrai
Always want to know how your day was when you have no one left
Luôn luôn muốn biết em sống ra sao khi không có ai bên cạnh

แม้เธออาจไม่เห็นกัน ในบางวันที่เธอไม่ทุกข์ใจ
Mae Thoe At Mai Hen Kan, Nai Bang Wanthi Thoe Mai Thuk Chai
Even though you may not think of me
 when you are doing just fine
 
Cho dù khi đang hạnh phúc em chẳng hề để tâm đến anh.

ทำได้แค่เพียง แค่ทุกๆ อย่างที่เธอขอ
Tham Dai Khae Phiang
 Khae Thuk THuk Yang Thi Thoe Kho
All I can do
 is just
 doing everything for you
Điều anh có thể làm chỉ là làm mọi thứ cho em

จะนาน เท่าไร ไม่ว่า เมื่อไร ก็พร้อมจะยอมทำให้เธอ
Cha Nan, Thaorai, Maiwa, Muearai, Ko Phrom Cha YOm Thamhai Thoe
No matter 
how long it takes 
or 
what time it is,
 I'm willing to make time for you
Bất kể bao lâu hay là lúc nào đi chăng nữa, anh luôn sẵn sàng dành hết thời gian cho em.
เป็นทุกอย่างให้เธอแล้ว

Pen Thuk Yang Hai Thoe Laeo
I've been everything for you
Làm tất cả mọi điều vì em

แม้ว่าเธอไม่เคยเป็นอะไรกับฉันเล
Maewa Thoe Mai Khoei Pen Arai Kap Chan Loei
though we've never been more than friends
dù cho ta chưa bao giờ tiến xa hơn mức bạn bè

ฉันก็แค่คนหนึ่ง ที่เธอต้องการในบางครั้ง
Chan Ko Khae Khon Nueng, Thi Thoe Tongkan Nai Bang Khrang
I'm just someone you want sometimes
Anh chỉ là một người bạn, mà đôi lúc em cần

ได้อยู่ตรงนี้ก็ดีแค่ไหน
Dai Yu Trongni Kodi Khae Nai
It's been good enough so far
Mọi thứ như thế là đủ

จะหวังอะไรให้มากมาย
Cha Wang Arai Hai Makmai
Why would I want something else?
Sao anh lại muốn điều gì khác chứ?

เป็นคนที่เคยแอบรัก
Pen Khonthi Khoei Aep Rak
Be someone who secretly crushed on you
Là một người âm thầm thương em

เป็นคนที่เคยแอบหวัง
Pen Khonthi Khoei Aep Wang
Be someone who had expected something in return
Là một người chẳng mong đợi gì hơn

เป็นคนที่เธอให้ความสำคัญใน วันที่เธอไม่เหลือใคร
Pen Khonthi Thoe Hai Khwamsamkhan Nai Wanthi Thoe Mai Luea Khrai
Be someone who receives attention from you when you're lonely
Là một người chỉ được em quan tâm lúc em có một mình

เป็นให้เธอได้ทุกอย่าง แต่ก็เหมือนไม่มีความหมาย
Pen Hai Thoe Dai Thuk Yang, Tae Ko Muean Mai Mi Khrammai
I can be everything for you but they seem all meaningless
Anh có thể làm tất cả cho em, nhưng dường như chúng đều vô nghĩa


ทำได้แค่เพียง แค่ทุกๆอย่างที่เธอขอ
Tham Dai Khae Phiang, Khae Thuk Thuk Yang Thi Thoe Kho
My role is doing everything for you
Vị trí của anh là làm mọi thứ cho em

จะนาน เท่าไร ไม่ว่า เมื่อไร ก็พร้อมจะยอมทำให้เธอ
Cha Nan Thaorai, Maiwa, Muearai, Ko Phrom Cha Yom Thamhai Thoe
No matter how long it takes or what time it is,
 I'm willing to make time for you
Bất kể bao lâu hay là lúc nào đi chăng nữa, anh luôn sẵn sàng dành hết thời gian cho em.
เป็นทุกอย่างให้เธอแล้ว

Pen Thuk Yang Hai Thoe Laeo
I've been everything for you
Làm tất cả mọi điều vì em

แม้ว่าเธอไม่เคยเป็นอะไรกับฉันเล
Maewa Thoe Mai Khoei Pen Arai Kap Chan Loei
though we've never been more than friends
dù cho ta chưa bao giờ tiến xa hơn mức bạn bè

ฉันก็แค่คนหนึ่ง ที่เธอต้องการในบางครั้ง
Chan Ko Khae Khon Nueng, Thi Thoe Tongkan Nai Bang Khrang
I'm just someone you want sometimes
Anh chỉ là một người bạn, mà đôi lúc em cần

ได้อยู่ตรงนี้ก็ดีแค่ไหน
Dai Yu Trongni Kodi Khae Nai
It's been good enough so far
Mọi thứ như thế là đủ

จะหวังอะไรให้มากมาย
Cha Wang Arai Hai Makmai
Why would I want something else?
Sao anh lại muốn điều gì khác chứ?

similars.titleTh: อย่าให้ฉันคิด
